name: CENTRE FOR EDUCATION AND HEALTH RESEARCH ORGANIZATION

address: 372 F/F Munirka Village,opp: Jnu Main Gate  New Delhi

briefDescription: Centre for Education & Health Research Organization is a Delhi based Ngo focusing its interventions on underserved children, their families, mainly in the slum of Munirka. Cehro directly benefitting unprivileged and  neglected sections of the society, vigorously working  to bring changes in their lives, realize their dreams of living a respectful and dignified life with basic needs, proper health care and education to all. Our Main aim is to empower each and every under privilege child through education to earn his/her livelihood. We educate children to such level  in order to increase their awareness on a range of issues from healthcare to appropriate social behaviour to understanding oneâ€™s rights  and through all these process at last it help him/her evolve as a better citizen. Under Education programmes we also provide nutrition Support to the less privileged children for their growth, development and well nourishment.

address: F-481 F/F KH No 7 Gali NO 16 Chand Bagh
